examples.translation: I pulled an all-nighter studying before the exam.

examples.chinese: 不要常常熬夜看書，對身體不好。
examples.translation: Don't stay up late studying all the time, it's bad for your health.

examples.chinese: 他昨晚熬夜讀書，今天很累。
examples.translation: He stayed up all night studying last night, so he's very tired today.
